Docs.summary: A Class representing a SqlServerConnectionPolicy along with the instance operations that can be performed on it. If you have a you can construct a from an instance of using the GetSqlServerConnectionPolicyResource method. Otherwise you can get one from its parent resource using the GetSqlServerConnectionPolicy method.
